name: letterboxd_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Letterboxd in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling letterboxd_search multiple times.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('li.search-result').forEach((el,i) => { if(i>=5) return; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h2 a, span.film-title-wrapper a, a'); const yearEl = el.querySelector('small.metadata, span.metadata'); const dirEl = el.querySelector('p.film-metadata a, a.text-sluglist'); const link = titleEl?titleEl.getAttribute('href'):''; results.push({ title: titleEl?titleEl.textContent.trim():'', year: yearEl?yearEl.textContent.trim():'', director: dirEl?dirEl.textContent.trim():'', url: link?'https://letterboxd.com'+link:'' }); }); const pathParts = window.location.pathname.split('/search/'); const query = pathParts[1] ? decodeURIComponent(pathParts[1].replace(/\/$/, '')) : ''; return { query, results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
